item.title: Towards a more mobile-friendly back office
item.description: Until now, PrestaShop always relied on a desktop-first responsive design strategy. Indeed, there are few use cases on mobile. But you can’t prevent users from checking their store’s back office on their mobile! Why work on responsive design?
